                                                                 Automated Records Management System
       DRAFT Q & A FOR FOOD SAFETY EVENT
                                                                 Hex-Dump Conversion



       Q:   Are these actions just a response to the negative news articles of recent days that have
            pointed out the shortcomings in the inspection of imported produce?



       Q:   There is an article that reveals that the actions taken by the President today were urged on
            him by Commissioner Kessler years ago, yet no action was taken. Why has it taken so
            long to act?


       Q:   Are these actions meant to provide political cover with respect to the food safety issue
            because it has become a part of the Fast Track trade debate?



       Q:   What makes you think these measures can be effective?



       Q:   Do you seriously think you are going to be able to put FDA inspectors in every country
            abroad? Won't they resent that?


       Q:   Doesn't this amount to imposition of trade barriers to food imports at a time when you
            claim you are seeking to lower trade barriers?


       Q:   Hasn't our country raised a racket when other countries have kept out our food products
            because of alleged health and safety concerns?


       Q:   What exactly are you doing today?


       Q:
